column4: has anyone upgraded ubuntu gutsy to hardy using aptitude tool please reply
yes. Don't do it, it's painful :)
what problems did you face when you upgraded using aptitude
it takes ages and asks a number of times about replacing config files. Possibly easier to backup home and do a clean install I think..
only a minimal server install, no desktop.. not sure if the difference was because it was LTS -> LTS or just because I had very little installed
